description: Process execution events for processes that were already running when the Falcon sensor started. These represent the baseline of running processes discovered during sensor initialization. Contains the same fields as ProcessRollup2 but identifies pre-existing processes.

columns.name: event_simpleName
columns.description: Event type identifier

columns.name: aid
columns.description: Agent ID - unique identifier for the endpoint

columns.name: cid
columns.description: Customer ID - unique identifier for the CrowdStrike tenant

columns.name: event_platform
columns.description: Operating system platform

columns.name: ComputerName
columns.description: Hostname of the endpoint

columns.name: UserName
columns.description: Username associated with the process

columns.name: UserSid
columns.description: Windows Security Identifier for the user

columns.name: ImageFileName
columns.description: Full path to the process executable

columns.name: FileName
columns.description: Base filename of the executable (without path)

columns.name: CommandLine
columns.description: Full command line arguments passed to the process

columns.name: TargetProcessId
columns.description: Falcon's unique process identifier (UPID) for correlation across events

columns.name: ParentProcessId
columns.description: Falcon process identifier of the parent process (may be unknown for synthetic events)

columns.name: ParentBaseFileName
columns.description: Base filename of the parent process (often 'unknown-synthetic-process' for pre-existing processes)

columns.name: ProcessStartTime
columns.description: Process start timestamp (epoch time, predates sensor start)

columns.name: ContextTimeStamp
columns.description: Event timestamp in epoch milliseconds

columns.name: MD5HashData
columns.description: MD5 hash of the process executable

columns.name: SHA256HashData
columns.description: SHA256 hash of the process executable

columns.name: SHA1HashData
columns.description: SHA1 hash of the process executable

columns.name: LocalIP
columns.description: Local IP address of the endpoint

columns.name: SignInfoFlags
columns.description: Bitmask indicating code signature validation results

columns.name: ConfigBuild
columns.description: Falcon sensor configuration build version

columns.name: UID
columns.description: Unix User ID (Linux/Mac)

columns.name: GID
columns.description: Unix Group ID (Linux/Mac)

common_operations: Identify baseline running processes at sensor startup
Distinguish from new process starts using ParentBaseFileName=unknown-synthetic-process
Join with ProcessRollup2 for complete process timeline
